be in trouble, have a problem

on the way, in the midst of

give (to a younger person, subordinate, animals or plants)

(suffix added to a person's job title as a polite way of referring to them)
home (respectful equivalent of うち or いえ)

envelope for a gift of money
wrapping cloth used to carry things
instant noodles sold in a ready-to-use disposable container, pot noodles

How would you like it done? (respectful)

anybody (respectful equivalent of だれでも)

N4L50VQuiz.question: go, come (humble equivalent of いきます and きます)
eat, drink, receive (humble equivalent of たべます, のみます, and もらいます)
say, (one's name) is ~ (humble equivalent of いいます)
know, get to know (humble equivalent of しります)
ask, hear, visit (humble equivalent of ききます and いきます)
meet (humble equivalent of あいます)
become tense, be strained, be nervous
